channel.title: Server offline?
channel.description: Ive just heard about these private servers and i made one and i tried to add the server to this website but it says my server is offline and it must be online to add it. someone plz help :)

item.title: Server offline?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

[quote=“no1toldme2, post:2, topic:398236”][quote author=dukecheese2011 link=topic=495370.msg3621646#msg3621646 date=1307475405]
Ive just heard about these private servers and i made one and i tried to add the server to this website but it says my server is offline and it must be online to add it. someone plz help
[/quote]
What do you mean by “adding to this website”?[/quote]
He means, adding his server to the server status page Here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
…
anyway… Well… IS it online?
if it is, Did you portforward?

Read full topic
